summary:
•	Industrial engineer with specialization in management and business administration.
•	4 years’ experience in design, implementation and control of integrated management systems in compliance with the requirements of ISO and OHSAS standards in manufacturing and construction sectors and 4 years working experience in business and environmental consulting. 
•	Highly motivated and committed to incorporate sustainability into all aspects of work, with positive attitude towards team work, empathy and good interpersonal relationships. Critical thinking skills, active listening, and monitoring. Proactive, self-starter, flexible.
•	Main fields of interest for personal development: project management, system management, environment, energy, industrial technology and quality control.

profile_positions.description:
–	Support and guidance to graduate students who are candidates for a master degree, helping them select coursework, as well as shaping, refining and directing the students' choice in which they will be examined and write a thesis/project report.
–	Guidance provided in the field of quality management, environmental and safety management and energy management. 

Currently involved in four study projects: 1. Design of an integrated system ISO 14001-OHSAS 18001 in a small furniture factory. 2. Design of an integrated management system ISO 9001 – ISO 22000- OHSAS 18001 in a food distribution company. 3. Design of a safety management system in the public water company. 4. Design of a management plan of chemical substances in an electrical substation in Bolivia.
